Articles.Content:
I invite all of you to join the new KSP group on Facebook Kerbal Space Program Military Creations! There is multiple groups ok Facebook for KSP in general but until now there hasn't been one for military related creations to be shared and found easier and more quickly than before! If you are interested in fighter jets, bombers, ships, Intel planes, tanks, etc.... then come join us at KSP military Creations!

Facebook page link: [https://www.facebook.com/groups/372011822987779/](https://www.facebook.com/groups/372011822987779/)
